mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_msgs WHERE chat_room_idx = #{chat_room_idx} ORDER BY chat_msg_date ;

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT mem_seller.chat_room_idx , product_idx, mem_seller_idx, mem_seller_nickname, mem_buyer_idx ,mem_buyer_nickname ,chat_room_area FROM ( SELECT chat_room_idx , product_idx ,mem_seller_idx, mem_nickname AS mem_seller_nickname FROM chat_rooms cr JOIN mem_info mi ON cr.mem_seller_idx = mi.mem_idx ) as mem_seller JOIN ( SELECT chat_room_idx ,mem_buyer_idx, mem_nickname AS mem_buyer_nickname ,chat_room_area FROM chat_rooms cr JOIN mem_info mi ON cr.mem_buyer_idx = mi.mem_idx ) AS mem_buyer ON mem_seller.chat_room_idx = mem_buyer.chat_room_idx WHERE ( mem_seller_idx = #{mem_idx} OR mem_buyer_idx = #{mem_idx} ) AND chat_room_area = #{chat_room_area}
) AS cr JOIN ( SELECT p1.product_idx,mem_idx,product_title, product_info,product_payment,product_price, product_sell_status,product_location,image1,image_path FROM product_image pi2 JOIN ( SELECT product_idx , mem_idx, product_title,product_info, product_payment, product_price, product_sell_status, product_location FROM jung_product WHERE product_selector = #{chat_room_area} ) AS p1 ON p1.product_idx = pi2.product_idx ) AS p ON cr.product_idx = p.product_idx ORDER BY chat_room_idx DESC ;
